EmailTemplate.name: SF Open House.Registered Email
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Monday at our Open House and Happy Hour!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The Bigcommerce team is looking forward to seeing you Monday at our San Francisco Office <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/685+Market+St,+San+Francisco,+CA+94105/@37.7877948,-122.4050943,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x808580886ac3768f:0xc10ad136f515378d]]> Happy Hour and Open House! Feel free to bring friends and stop by between 4:00 - 7:00pm PT. See you soon!
Kind regards, The Bigcommerce Partner Team
Remember: Our office is located at 685 Market Street, 3rd Floor San Francisco, CA 94105.
